title: Find My Plate Qatar
intro: Due to recent floods, many people lost their car plates. Many have also reported finding them on social media. This website aims at connecting them.
search_header: Search for your lost plate by number
not_found: Sorry, no plates found! Please check back later or leave your contact number for anyone reporting the same to see it.
report_received: Your report was received successfully. Thanks!
found_registrations: Someone searched for this plate, please contact them in case they don't check back later:
registration_received: Your registration was received successfully. Anyone reporting the same will see your contact number
